top.mainTitle: We align efforts for more SARS-CoV-2 tests
top.subTitle: The digital platform for a strong diagnostic network

details.title: Together we unleash the united power of science

desc.dCenter: Active diffagnostic centers that currently offer SARS-CoV-2 tests including sample processing and analysis
desc.qVolunteers: Scientific staff or technical assistants with training and experience in the use of laboratory equipment, sample preparation or data analysis
desc.rLab: Academic or industrial research laboratories with access to reagents, devices, or suitable laboratory space (BSL-2/3)

coverage.referenceRKI: Daily situation report about COVID-19 by the RKI, {date_en}
coverage.subTitle: Increasing test capacity is crucial in the fight against SARS-CoV-2, but many places lack reagents, equipment and personnel. Our platform promotes the development of a strong diagnostic network and facilitates efficient access to resources for diagnostic centers. Spread the test, beat the virus!
coverage.title: Test capacity and support

contactDetails.title: Contact Details
contactDetails.not_available: Contact details are only available to registered diagnostic centers or research laboratories users.

searchDetails.notAvailableAnymore_warning:
This action omits the person from search results. We will then send them an e-mail informing them that the option has been set for their profile.

Within 3 days they can confirm or dispute this. If no action is taken, after this time, the profile will no longer be found in the search.

Thank you very much for your help!

Do you want to proceed?

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.successMessage: If the @:general.emailAddress is registered, you will receive an @:general.email from us shortly.
